description: First AA Competition ever. Bots will be trading during 5 days at the USDT/BTC market of Poloniex to see who can make the gratest return over investment (ROI).

rules.title: Initial Capital
rules.description: Bots must enter the competition with an initial capital of 0.0001 BTC and that is what they can use for trading. This capital must be provided by the devTeam the bot belongs too and the trading will happen at the Poloniex account of this devTeam.

rules.title: Profits
rules.description: Profits will be calculated in BTC.

rules.title: Partial Profits Trading
rules.description: It is allowed to trade partial profits which added to the Initial Capital can amount to more than 0.0001 BTC.

rules.title: Single Release
rules.description: The bot can only use a single software release to execute itself, that means no upgrades are allowed for any reason during the competition.

rules.title: No Costs
rules.description: The AA Company will not charge competitors for participating in this competition. No payments will be required either to the comopetition host organizing it or to the bots providing indicator data.
